refnamediv.refpurpose: view system information and VM configuration details

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The VPoxManage list subcommands enable you to obtain information about the &product-name; software and the VMs that you create.

refsect2.title: Common Options

listitem.para: Shows detailed information about each VM and its configuration. The short form of this option is -l.
Sorts the list of VM entries alphabetically. The short form of this option is -s.

refsect2.title: List the Bridged Network Interfaces on the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list bridgedifs command lists the bridged network interfaces that are currently available on the host system. The output shows detailed configuration information about each interface.

refsect2.title: List the Cloud Profiles
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list cloudprofiles command lists the cloud profiles that have been configured. A cloud profile contains settings for a cloud service account.

refsect2.title: List the Cloud Providers
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list cloudproviders command lists the cloud providers that are supported by &product-name;. Oracle Cloud Infrastructure is an example of a cloud provider.

refsect2.title: List the DHCP Servers That Are Available on the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list dhcpservers command lists the DHCP servers that are currently available on the host system. The output shows detailed configuration information about each DHCP server.

refsect2.title: List the DVD Virtual Disk Images
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list dvds command shows information about the DVD virtual disk images that are currently in use by the &product-name; software. For each image, the output shows all the settings, the UUIDs associated with the image by &product-name;, and all files associated with the image.
This command performs the same function as the Virtual Media Manager.

refsect2.title: List the Installed &product-name; Extension Packs
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list extpacks command shows all &product-name; extension packs that are currently installed.

refsect2.title: List the Floppy Disk Virtual Disk Images
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list floppies command shows information about the floppy disk images that are currently in use by the &product-name; software. For each image, the output shows all the settings, the UUIDs associated with the image by &product-name;, and all files associated with the image.
This command performs the same function as the Virtual Media Manager.

refsect2.title: List Information about Virtual Machine Groups
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list groups command shows detailed information about VM groups.

refsect2.title: List the Virtual Disk Backends
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list hddbackends command lists all known virtual disk backends of the &product-name; software. For each such format, such as VDI, VMDK, or RAW, this command lists the backend's capabilities and configuration.

refsect2.title: List the Hard Disk Virtual Disk Images
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list hdds command shows information about the hard disk virtual disk images that are currently in use by the &product-name; software. For each image, the output shows all the settings, the UUIDs associated with the image by &product-name;, and all files associated with the image.
This command performs the same function as the Virtual Media Manager.

refsect2.title: List the CPUID Information for the Host System CPUs
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list hostcpuids command lists CPUID information for each CPU on the host system. Use this information to perform a more fine grained analyis of the host system's virtualization capabilities.

refsect2.title: List the DVD Interfaces on the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list hostdvds command lists the DVD interfaces on the host system. Each DVD entry includes the name used to access them from within &product-name;.

refsect2.title: List the Floppy Disk Interfaces on the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list hostfloppies command lists the floppy disk interfaces on the host system. Each floppy disk entry includes the name used to access them from within &product-name;.

refsect2.title: List Information About the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list hostinfo command shows information about the host system. The output includes information about the CPUs, memory, and the OS version.

refsect2.title: List the Host-Only Network Interfaces on the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list hostonlyifs command lists the host-only network interfaces that are currently available on the host system. The output shows detailed configuration information about each interface.

refsect2.title: List Internal Networks
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list intnets command shows information about the internal networks.

refsect2.title: List the NAT Network Interfaces on the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list natnets command lists the NAT network interfaces that are currently available on the host system.

refsect2.title: List the Guest Operating Systems
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list ostypes command lists all guest operating systems (OSes) that are known to &product-name;. Each OS entry includes an identifier, a description, a family identifier, a family description, and whether the OS has 64-bit support.
You can use these identifiers with the VPoxManage modifyvm command.

refsect2.title: List the Running Virtual Machines
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list runningvms command lists all virtual machines (VMs) that are currently running. By default this displays a compact list that shows the name and Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) of each VM.

refsect2.title: List the Available Screen Shot Formats
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list screenshotformats command shows the list of available screen shot formats.

refsect2.title: List System Properties
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list systemproperties command shows some global &product-name; settings, such as minimum and maximum guest RAM, virtual hard disk size, folder settings, and the current authentication library in use.

refsect2.title: List the Registered Global USB Filters
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list usbfilters command lists all global USB filters registered with &product-name; and displays the filter parameters. Global USB filters are for devices which are accessible to all virtual machines.

refsect2.title: List the USB Devices on the Host System
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list usbhost command shows information about the USB devices that are attached to the host system. The output includes information that you can use to construct USB filters and indicates whether the device is currently in use by the host system.

refsect2.title: List Virtual Machines
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list vms command lists all virtual machines (VMs) that are currently registered with &product-name;. By default this command displays a compact list that shows the name and UUID of each VM.

refsect2.title: List the Webcams Attached to a Running Virtual Machine
refsect2.para: The VPoxManage list webcams command shows the list of webcams that are attached to the running VM.
The output is a list of absolute paths or aliases that are used to attach the webcams to the VM by using the VPoxManage webcam attach command.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: The following command lists the VM groups configured for &product-name;.
The following command lists the VMs that are currently running.
